name: All for a Gift
description:
Welcome to Greenchwille, a twisted world, where everyone wants their precious presents.

Watch your step or you may get burnt to a crisp on this snowy day!

This jolly game was made over a span of 3 days  by five friends who were high on marshmallows and kulkuls. 

Dev - The Programmer who couldn't feel a few muscles after making this game
Chris - The UI wand-wielding magician
Shamika - The dark child of Art
Apar - The level headed Game Designer who kept all of us from losing our heads
Divya - The Game Designer who believes scaring is caring

Music provided by

  • No room at the inn  by TRG Banks
  • Carol Of The Bells by Audionautix is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
    Artist: http://audionautix.com/
